attributes.action: Make Methodone a Class A Drug
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Methodone is attracting Children as young as 14 from folk who are distributing this.

Until the this has been classified as a Class A Drug the Police have no power, which gives the wrong message.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
